game.name: Call of Duty®: Modern Warfare®
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, In-App Purchases
game.shortDescription: 다양한 스펙 옵스 챌린지와 혼합된 멀티플레이어 맵 및 모드가 있는 최고의 온라인 게임에서 열광적인 캠페인을 경험하거나 팀을 구성하십시오.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Experience a visceral Campaign or assemble your team in the ultimate online playground with multiple Special Ops challenges and a mix of Multiplayer maps and modes.
game.developers: Infinity Ward, Beenox, High Moon Studios, Raven Software

reviewHighlights.text: Call of Duty Modern Warfare (2019) - 100% Now this review is just for the campaign, as i am one of the few who only plays COD for campaign. The story...
A great reboot packed with an amazing campaign that has a very dark and gritty tone, this game singlehandedly brought COD back again before they burie...
